location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 3119 of 1865 from Charles Gonne, Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay Castle to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a despatch received by the officer in charge (No.48, 24 October 1865) at Bushire from the Ameer [Amir] of the Wahabees [Wahhabis] regarding the attack on British Subjects at Soor [Sur]. The despatch is not included.
